import React from 'react' const NewsItems = (props)=>{ let {title, description,imageUrl,newsUrl,author,date,source} = props; return ( <>
{source}
{title}

{description}...

By {!author?"Unknow":author} on {new Date(date).toGMTString()}

Read More
) } export default NewsItems
